jline

Class OSvTerminal

  • java.lang.Object
    • jline.TerminalSupport
      • jline.OSvTerminal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Terminal

    public class OSvTerminal
extends TerminalSupport
    Terminal that is used for OSv. This is seperate to unix terminal implementation because exec cannot be used as currently used by UnixTerminal. This implimentation is derrived from the implementation at https://github.com/cloudius-systems/mgmt/blob/master/crash/src/main/java/com/cloudius/cli/OSvTerminal.java authored by Or Cohen.
    Since:
    2.13
    Author:
    Or Cohen, Arun Neelicattu
